sentence.Network_en: No one knows it yet, but the city has a new poet: The Sauerkraut Poet.
sentence.Network_cn: 还没人知晓, 但这座城市有了位新的诗人: 泡菜诗人.

sentence.Network_en: To reduce the sodium content, rinse canned or jarred sauerkraut before eating.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了降低钠的含量, 食用前冲洗灌装或坛装的腌菜.

sentence.Network_en: Light can also be explosive when combined with a little sauerkraut.
sentence.Network_cn: 在轻爆的时候也可以加上少许的酸菜.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 德国酸菜（Sauerkraut）是德国的传统食品，用圆白菜或大头菜腌制。除了德语国家，美国的威斯康星州也有食用这种酸菜的传统。

entry.def: Sauerkraut is cabbage which has been cut into very small pieces and pickled. It is eaten mainly in Germany.
